https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dc8BdKnDY5Iy28KzUGtHIXuqqFK.jpg Dean and Cindy live a quiet life in a modest neighborhood. They appear to have the world at their feet at the outset of the relationship. However, his lack of ambition and her retreat into self-absorption cause potentially irreversible cracks in their marriage. Blue Valentine
